answers.answer: Hi, this could be neuropathy due to vitamin B deficiency, low calcium level, cervical spine stenosis causing nerve compression. Get blood vitamin B and calcium levels done along with MRI cervical spine.Try vitamin B supplements too. How old are you and do you have history of diabetes or hypertension?

question: I have been having these tingling sensations in my thighs and my hands. my pinky's and ring fingers have also been going numb and tingling latley also. I was diagnosed with crostocrodritius and have been getting these red bumps with red and white rings on my tongue latley. I feel like I'm going crazy please advise....
title: tingling
